name: SurfZilla
description:
Godzilla has rampaged before, but this time around he terrorized the seas acquiring new power for his vengeance against the human race. WIth the power of water, he is surfing through cities causing destruction left and right in his wake. His power also allows him to detect the breaking points of buldings allowing for massive destruction with one quick swoop of his magical staff. The army is once again trying to stop him, but resistance is futile.

Controls:

The game is played with Htc Vive and a Wii balance board. You reset the board and your view by looking down the road and hit the menu button on your vive wand. Leaning left and right, perpendicular to the. allows you to dodge the army and hit buildings. Hit the buildings on their breaking point to score before the army stops you
